title: Eminem's 23-year-old daughter Hailie Jade expertly channels Ariana Grande for Halloween
text:
Hailie Jade Scott, Eminem's 23-year old daughter with over 1.7 million Instagram followers, is channeling a famous musician this Halloween. But it isn't her dad.

She shared an Instagram post Monday night ahead of the holiday dressed as Ariana Grande, decked out in all the essential details fans have come to know the "Thank U, Next" singer for: a high ponytail, winged eyeliner, a choker necklace, an oversized hoodie worn as a dress and thigh-high boots.

Scott also posed with a red lollipop, a la that viral paparazzi photo of Grande eating candy while walking with then-boyfriend "Saturday Night Live" comedian Pete Davidson.

I need someone to be the Pete Davidson to my Ariana Grande so I can re-create this look for Halloween thx pic.twitter.com/C4zZsPk1yW — sp👀ky spice (ﾉω＼) (@kbbqueen) October 22, 2019

"💍💍💍💍💍💍💍" she captioned the post, referencing Grande's song "7 Rings."

Scott has gone viral several times as of late for her relation and likeness to Eminem. Earlier this month, she shared a selfie on Instagram that made everyone do a double take: Even with makeup and long hair, she's the spitting image of her famous dad.

The daughter of Eminem's ex-wife Kim Scott, Hailie has been the inspiration for a handful of her dad's songs, including "My Dad's Gone Crazy," which she voiced the hook for. The song debuted when she was 6 years old, and she was later awarded a Guinness World Record for Youngest R&B Chart Entrant.

"When she gets older, she can grow up and say, 'my dad put me on the song. My dad sung songs about me… my dad put my name everywhere,' " Eminem said in an interview in the early 2000s.

He also rapped about her in "Hailie's Song" in 2002: "My baby girl keeps getting older / I watch her grow up with pride … My insecurities could eat me alive/ But then I see my baby / Suddenly I'm not crazy / It all makes sense when I look into her eyes."

This article originally appeared on USA TODAY: Eminem's daughter Hailie Jade is Ariana Grande in Halloween costume
description: Hailie Jade Mathers, Eminem's 23-year-old daughter, is channeling a musician for Halloween this year. But instead of her dad, it's Ariana Grande.
